general.byline: Founder & Design Researcher in Savannah, Georgia, USA, He/Him
general.about:
Heyyyyooo \
I'm Sravan!!

I started as an engineer, but I've always loved design. Solving problems and creating things that people enjoy using – that's what excites me. So, I became a UX Designer. I worked with lots of startups, and eventually, I started my own design agency, WE Agency. WE help businesses create amazing experiences for their customers and build products from scratch.

But my passion for creating goes beyond the digital world. I'm a techie at heart, always curious about the latest gadgets and how they can improve our lives. And that curiosity extends to the world around me. I love to travel, and discover the unique flavors each place has to offer.

Right now, I'm back to school and adding another dimension to my journey by pursuing a Masters in Business and Innovation at SCAD.

projects.heading: Blueton at We Think App
projects.description: Spearheaded the UX research and design for Blueton Analytics, a groundbreaking, cloud-based Manufacturing Execution System (MES) platform, and the first to offer an all-encompassing solution in the industry. My role involved conducting in-depth user research and designing a seamless interface that integrates diverse functionalities including HRMS, employee management, machine and shift scheduling, floor mapping, and modules for Work Order, Production, People, Projects, Machine, Inventory, Process, and Facility management. This holistic approach enables manufacturers to gain unparalleled control and visibility over their entire production and operational ecosystem, enhancing efficiency across all levels.
projects.title: Blueton

projects.heading: Ausbildung Assist at Marthala Solutions
projects.description:
Ausbildung Assist is an innovative platform designed to revolutionize the Ausbildung recruitment process. "Ausbildung" refers to a system of vocational education and training prevalent in German-speaking countries, where students combine part-time academic study with apprenticeships in various industries. This dual system allows students to gain practical experience while completing their education.

The platform, Ausbildung Assist, was developed to address the gap between talented students seeking apprenticeships and industry leaders looking for skilled apprentices. By creating a multi-user CRM (Customer Relationship Management) system, the platform enables efficient application processing, tracking, and management for both internal users (such as recruiters and training managers) and applicants.
projects.title: Ausbildung Assist

projects.heading: Medvarsity
projects.description: Medvarsity is Asia's largest healthcare EdTech company, accredited by the British Accreditation Council. It offers over 200 blended learning courses designed for healthcare professionals, including doctors, nurses, and other medical staff. Medvarsity's programs span various specialties and aim to enhance the skills and qualifications of healthcare practitioners through certificates and fellowships. The platform supports a global community of learners and provides practical, skill-based education that can be directly applied in healthcare settings.
projects.title: Medvarsity

projects.heading: KLIP
projects.description: Klipglobal is a workforce wellbeing and development service that provides personalized, holistic, science-backed plans to help employees lead healthier and more fulfilled lives. The platform aims to enhance the wellbeing of employees, which in turn supports the success and strategic delivery of their organizations. Klipglobal offers a variety of services, including live masterclasses, wellness programs, and tools for monitoring and achieving wellbeing goals. These services are designed to help individuals and organizations thrive by improving mental health, engagement, and productivity.
projects.title: KLIP

projects.heading: DocTutorial Mobile App at DocTutorial
projects.description: DocTutorials is a comprehensive digital learning platform specifically designed for medical students, professionals preparing for competitive exams such as NEET PG, FMGE, and NEET SS. It offers a wide array of resources including expertly crafted video lectures, extensive question banks (Qbanks), interactive live classes, and rigorous mock tests, all aimed at enhancing exam preparedness. The platform's content is developed by experienced medical practitioners and educators, ensuring that students receive high-quality guidance and support throughout their preparation journey.
projects.title: DocTutorial Mobile App

projects.heading: FarmFood
projects.description: A mobile application that connects connects farmers directly with customers for buying and selling organic products.
projects.title: FarmFood

projects.heading: Website Redesign at Maarthala Solutions
projects.description: Showcasing a sleek and intuitive website design for an education consultancy service. Seamlessly blending functionality and aesthetics, I crafted a user-centered experience to empower students in their educational journey..
projects.title: Website Redesign

projects.heading: Sneaker Vault at Qurinom Solutions
projects.description: Sneaker Vault is the ultimate mobile application for sneaker enthusiasts. Unlock a world of luxury and style as you browse, rent, and flaunt a collection of the most sought-after sneakers,where you can get sneakers for rentals
projects.title: Sneaker Vault

projects.heading: Pilgrimage
projects.description: Pilgrimage is the essential mobile application for pilgrims embarking on sacred journeys, Seamlessly navigate your pilgrimage with ease as you access a treasure trove of vital information and resources.From routes to accommodation options.
projects.title: Pilgrimage

projects.heading: TrackMate
projects.description: SaveTrack can track and record all of your subscribed applications on your mobile device, so you can easily see what youre paying for and when your subscriptions are due to renew.
projects.title: TrackMate

projects.title: BlackON
